name: Hell in Space
overview: Once again, this game was produced using Mastertronic's games creator with some additional code & stuff, featuring hard-core techno music in the title. Although I claim that this game is essentially fake crappy stuff, this title actually had a good score in GameOver(view), and you'll probably find this piece hilarious to play, just like Booze Cruise. Instructions are on the title screen. Released in GO64! 2005/05.
